thread.section_title: Hotel Monge - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent boutique hotel in the 5th.
thread.title_full: Excellent boutique hotel in the 5th. - Review of Hotel Monge, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Adeeaj
title: Excellent boutique hotel in the 5th.
text:
I am so happy I booked this hotel after reading all the excellent reviews on TripAdvisor. Upon our early arrival, our room wasn't ready, but no worries. We were able to check in, freshen up in their stylish and clean restroom, securely store our bags, and be off to explore Paris in just a few minutes.
After getting into our room later in the day, we were amazed by the decor, the size of the room (compared to typical Paris standards), the French doors opening onto a small patio, and the super comfortable bed!
They have a plentiful honor bar / happy hour selection of beverages and light snacks before dinner which is nice, and their breakfast is simply outstanding. No matter your preference of foods, they have it. We were only able to enjoy breakfast 1 day due to having early mornings the other days we stayed, but please do book the breakfast. You won't regret it. Completely worth the few extra euros you will spend.
Believe me, if and when we return to Paris, I will absolutely book this hotel. Their front desk/ reception was polite, friendly, and spoke good English which is nice after a long day of traveling. Thanks Tripadvisor for a great recommendation!
Room Tip: We had a room on the 2nd floor which included French doors onto a small patio. Not sure about upper... See more room tips
